languages.text: {n}Взгляд Иеронимуса полон благоговения. Втянув воздух, полнящийся запахом горелой плоти и прометия, он произносит:{/n} "Узри, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, как Футфол преображается прямо на твоих глазах! Благодаря тебе обитель порока вновь станет памятником величию Императора, коим она и замышлялась когда-то. Ты счастлив{mf||а}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Преподобный Иеронимус с благоговением окидывает взором следы правосудия Инцендии вокруг. Протяжно втянув ноздрями воздух, полнящийся запахом горелой плоти и огнеметного топлива, он обращается к вам.{/n} "Узри, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, как Футфол преображается прямо на твоих глазах! Благодаря тебе обитель порока вновь станет памятником величию Императора, коим она и замышлялась когда-то. Ты счастлив{mf||а}?"

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus's gaze is alight with awe. He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, noble {name}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Иеронимуса полон благоговения. Втянув воздух, полнящийся запахом горелой плоти и прометия, он произносит:{/n} "Узри, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, как Футфол преображается прямо на твоих глазах! Благодаря тебе обитель порока вновь станет памятником величию Императора, коим она и замышлялась когда-то. Ты счастлив{mf||а}?"

He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, my {mf|son|daughter}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスの目は畏敬の念で輝いていた。焼けた肉とプロメチウムの臭いを吐き出し、話しかけてくる。{/n}「高貴なる{name}様、ご覧ください。その目の前でフットフォールが生まれ変わるところを！御身の努力のおかげで、この腐敗の巣窟は本来の設計通り、再び皇帝の偉大さを示す証となるのです。お喜びいただけますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's gaze is alight with awe. He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, noble {name}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスの目は畏敬の念で輝いていた。焼けた肉とプロメチウムの臭いを吐き出し、話しかけてくる。{/n}「高貴なる{name}様、ご覧ください。その目の前でフットフォールが生まれ変わるところを！御身の努力のおかげで、この腐敗の巣窟は本来の設計通り、再び皇帝の偉大さを示す証となるのです。お喜びいただけますか？」

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Hiéronymus brille d'admiration. Il renifle l'odeur de la chair brûlée et du prométhium, puis vous dit :{/n} « Regardez, noble {name} : Castel se transforme sous vos yeux ! Dans le sillage de vos efforts, cet antre de dépravation redeviendra un symbole de la grandeur de l'Empereur, comme il aurait toujours dû l'être. N'est-ce pas réjouissant ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's gaze is alight with awe. He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, noble {name}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Hiéronymus brille d'admiration. Il renifle l'odeur de la chair brûlée et du prométhium, puis vous dit :{/n} « Regardez, {mf|mon fils|ma fille} : Castel se transforme sous vos yeux ! Dans le sillage de vos efforts, cet antre de dépravation redeviendra un symbole de la grandeur de l'Empereur, comme il aurait toujours dû l'être. N'est-ce pas réjouissant ? »

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯的目光充满了敬畏。他呼吸着充满烧焦的肉味与钷素气味的空气，对你开了口。{/n}“看吧，尊贵的{name}，落脚港正在你眼前发生蜕变！在你的努力下，这座堕落的巢穴将再次成为帝皇伟大的见证，正如它最初的设计一样。这样的结果是否让你感到欣悦不已？”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's gaze is alight with awe. He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, noble {name}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯的目光充满了敬畏。他呼吸着充满烧焦的肉味与钷素气味的空气，对你开了口。{/n}“看啊，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}，落脚港正在你眼前发生蜕变！在你的努力下，这座堕落的巢穴将再次成为帝皇伟大的见证，正如它最初的设计一样。这样的结果是否让你感到欣悦不已？”

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus' Blick ist voller Ehrfurcht. Er atmet den Geruch von verbranntem Fleisch und Promethium ein und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Seht, {mf|edler|edle} {name}, wie Footfall sich vor Euren Augen verwandelt! Nach Euren Bemühungen wird dieser Pfuhl der Verkommenheit wieder zu einem Beweis für die Größe des Imperators werden, wie ursprünglich vorgesehen. Erfüllt Euch das mit Freude?"
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's gaze is alight with awe. He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, noble {name}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus' Blick ist voller Ehrfurcht. Er atmet den Geruch von verbranntem Fleisch und Promethium ein und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Seht, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}, wie Footfall sich vor Euren Augen verwandelt! Nach Euren Bemühungen wird dieser Pfuhl der Verkommenheit wieder zu einem Beweis für die Größe des Imperators werden, wie ursprünglich vorgesehen. Erfüllt Euch das mit Freude?"

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Hieronymus está llena de asombro. Inhalando el olor a carne quemada y prometio, te dice:{/n} «Noble {name}, ¡contemple la transformación de Paso! Gracias a sus esfuerzos, esta guarida de depravación volverá a ser prueba de la grandeza del Emperador, tal y para lo que se concibió. ¿No le parece fascinante?».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's gaze is alight with awe. He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, noble {name}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Hieronymus está llena de asombro. Inhalando el olor a carne quemada y prometio, te dice:{/n} «Hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}, ¡contemple la transformación de Paso! Gracias a sus esfuerzos, esta guarida de depravación volverá a ser prueba de la grandeza del Emperador, tal y para lo que se concibió. ¿No le parece fascinante?».

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus'un bakışları, hayranlığını sergiliyor. Yanık et ve prometyum kokusunu içine çekip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Asil {name}, Binliman'ın gözlerinin önünde yaşadığı dönüşüme şahit ol! Verdiğin uğraşların neticesinde bu ahlaksızlık yuvası, kurulduğu zamanlardaki gibi yeniden İmparator'un ululuğunun ispatı olacak. Senin de için huşuyla dolmuyor mu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's gaze is alight with awe. He breathes in the smell of burnt flesh and promethium and says to you,{/n} "Behold, noble {name}, as Footfall transforms before your very eyes! In the wake of your toils, this den of depravity will once again become a testament to the Emperor's greatness, as was its original design. Does it bring you delight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus'un bakışları hayranlıkla parlıyor. Yanık et ve prometyum kokusunu içine çekiyor ve konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Asil {name}, Binliman'ın gözlerinin önünde dönüşümüne şahit ol! Verdiğin uğraşların neticesinde bu ahlaksızlık yuvası, kurulduğu anda olduğu gibi bir kez daha İmparator'un ululuğunun bir mabedi hâline gelecek. Senin de için huşuyla dolmuyor mu?"
